title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly
descriptions:
Sleep better with COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows.

What you get:
- Two pillows in one set (Queen size).
- Soft, supportive filling that feels like down, but is allergy-friendly.
- Gentle, smooth cover made from a soft polyester blend.

Easy to understand benefits:
- Stays cool and comfortable: The breathable design helps keep your head cool all night.
- Good for any sleep position: Works well for back, side, and stomach sleepers.
- Steady support: The filling stays in place, so the pillow won’t bunch up or go flat during the night.
- Kind to skin: Soft and skin-friendly materials.
- Keeps its shape: Support for your neck and shoulders without being too hard.

Simple care:
- Machine washable at 30°C (cold to warm water).
- Tumble dry on Low.
- No special detergents needed.

Before first use:
- The pillows arrive vacuum-packed to stay clean.
- Open the package and let them sit for 24 hours so they can fluff up fully.
- You can give them a gentle shake to help them puff up faster.

Why you’ll like them:
- Cool, comfy sleep.
- Easy to clean.
- Reliable support that helps reduce neck stiffness.
- A great fit for most beds and sleepers.

Make bedtime easier and more comfortable with COZSINOOR Cooling Bed Pillows. Sleep cool, sleep supported, wake up refreshed.
